article.para: The page describes the DocBook namespace, http://docbook.org/ns/docbook. This namespace identifies a family of documents that may be valid according one or more schemas.

section.title: RELAX NG Schemas
section.para: There is no normative schema for any language in this namespace at this time. The DocBook Technical Committee expects to publish the following schemas soon:

listitem.para: DocBook V5.0, a normative RELAX NG Grammar for DocBook V5.0.

section.title: W3C XML Schemas
section.para: There is no XML Schema for any language in this namespace at this time. The DocBook Technical Committee expects to publish the following schemas soon:

listitem.para: DocBook V5.0, an informative W3C XML Schema for DocBook V5.0.

section.title: XML DTDs
section.para: There is no DTD for any language in this namespace at this time. The DocBook Technical Committee expects to publish the following DTDs soon:

listitem.para: DocBook V5.0, an informative XML DTD for DocBook V5.0.
